item.title: Trees from neighbouring streets dumping waste, 7th February
item.description:
The garages in Silver Spring Close back on to gardens in Riverdale Road. In photos you can clearly see that they have cut their garden trees down and dumped the remaining branches over the wall into our garages area. This has been an issue for last 2 weeks.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Silver Spring Close, Northumberland Heath, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The two gulley drains on both corners of Alexandra Road 2m from the junction with Lennard Rd, Penge are blocked with clay soil from UKPN excavations. They are ponding right at the kerb ramp where people need to cross., 7th February
item.description:
The two gulley drains on both corners of Alexandra Road 2m from the junction with Lennard Rd, Penge are blocked with clay soil from UKPN excavations. They are ponding right at the kerb ramp where people need to cross. Seen Friday 6/2/26. UK Power Networks, UKPN, have had major excavation works about 1.5m deep and trenches about 7m in length over the last week at this location, with piled up soil to dig the trenches. The drains which are now blocked with heavy clay soil would appear to be the unremedied legacy of these utility works. Please either get UKPN to remove the blockages or do so as a council and recharge the cost to UKPN. Apart from this, the reinstatement looks good.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lennard Road, Penge, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street lamp light shining ditectly to bedrooms, 7th February
